<h1>Fossilizer requirements</h1>
Fossilizer is a simple web application, written in web2py.

<h2>Requirements</h2>
  *  Unix(-like) OS (Linux, FreeBSD, NetBSD, OpenBSD, OS X, Solaris, Minix, etc)
  *  <a href="http://www.web2py.com">web2py</a> (any version)
  *  python (>2.4)
  *  sqlite3 (and the python module which comes by default with most Python installations > 2.5)
  *  <a href="http://www.fossil-scm.org">fossil</a>
  *  CGI-capable web server ( I recommend <a href="http://www.cherokee-project.com">cherokee</a> but Apache, nginx, and Lighttpd will work )
